title: Can we study class 12 Chemistry before studying class 11 Chemistry? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rhetoric it may sound , but i can’t prevent ! Can you build the first floor of a building without the ground floor ? I reckon ‘NO’ is the legitimate reply . And so must be the answer to your question , however chemistry wont say ‘NO’ in absolute sense . There are few units from class 12 that are pretty much independent, and they can be covered parallel to class 11 . Once you have covered the basic units of 11th including Mole Concept , Atomic Structure , periodicity and Chemical Bonding , it means you can finish more than 90% topics of organic and inorganic chemistry from both 11 and 12th . That accounts for almost 65% of chemistry . Other units of class 12 such as Solutions , Kinetics , Electrochemistry will be dependent on the physical chemistry units of class 11 . So its better to develop a proficiency in class 11 first rather than an unsystematic approach .
